snippet: Ehud Olmert was cleared by a Jerusalem court on two counts in a high-profile corruption case that cut short his term in office and changed the course of Israeli politics and diplomacy.
abstract: Ehud Olmert, former prime minister of Israel, is acquitted of corruption in two major matters by a Jerusalem court; is convicted of breach of trust, the least serious of the charges he faced; ruling closes a high-profile prosecution that cut short Olmert's term in office and changed the course of Israeli politics and diplomacy.
lead_paragraph: Ehud Olmert was cleared by a Jerusalem court on two counts in a high-profile corruption case that cut short his term in office and changed the course of Israeli politics and diplomacy.

headline.seo: Ehud Olmert Cleared of Two Counts of Corruption
headline.main: Israeli Ex-Premier Cleared of Key Charges
headline.print_headline: Israeli Ex-Premier Cleared of Key Charges
